title: 数据库的版本有点高，暂时没有办法换成5.7的，可不可以有个补救的方案
body: 数据库的版本有点高，暂时没有办法换成5.7的，可不可以有个补救的方案  ，谢谢
author: franz007

comments.body: 你好，目前升级了MySQL 连接器版本，可以尝试升级重试。

title: Error when trying to run
body:
```
> pnpm run dev

> reactpress@1.6.0 dev C:\development\reactpress
> pnpm build:config && concurrently 'pnpm:dev:*'


> reactpress@1.6.0 build:config C:\development\reactpress
> pnpm run --dir ./config build


> @reactpress/config@1.0.0 build C:\development\reactpress\config
> tsc src/*.ts --outDir lib --skipLibCheck --declaration

error TS6053: File 'src/*.ts' not found.


Found 1 error.

 ELIFECYCLE  Command failed with exit code 2.
 ELIFECYCLE  Command failed with exit code 2.
 ELIFECYCLE  Command failed with exit code 2.
```
author: trashken

comments.body: Thank you for your feedback. We understand that using the wildcard * in Windows CMD to specify files for the tsc command can cause the compiler to not find the files. However, we have now resolved the project startup issue on Windows. You can try updating to the latest code to see the changes. If you encounter any further issues, please don't hesitate to reach out for help.
